 the germans have dubbed it!

It's using "Vodei" codec which is just bad news to anyone who has installed it. 
Read more from here:
http://personal.battleangel.org/2006/11/06/vodei-multimedia-processor/

everyone of this idiots uploads have been wrapped with vodei. you can't play it unless you subscribe to vodei, and eventually pay them cash. so he's basically making people pay him for pirated movies. dont do it. vodei messes with your system, although it doesnt 'at this time' report info or do anything known, that can change at any time. not smart to use it.
